pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Colour Perfector Protecting Express Repair Conditioner 200mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

The COLOUR PERFECTOR range for coloured or highlighted hair is formulated with HYALURON BLEND + CRANBERRY EXTRACT to deeply repair the inner hair structure while protecting its colour vibrancy. For visibly repaired hair and luminous shine that lasts.

Your coloured or highlighted hair loses vibrancy through hair washing. It
needs repair and special protection to retain its intense colour &
luminance.

EXTRA CARE COLOUR PERFECTOR offers:
+ EASY DETANGLING
+ DEEP HAIR REPAIR
+ COLOUR PROTECTION FOR UP TO
40 WASHES*

Made In Australia
Bottle made from 25% recycled plastic . 100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details.

*In combination with Colour Perfector Shampoo

Suitable For: Coloured or Highlighted Hair

Size: 200mL

Hair Type: Coloured or Highlighted Hair

KEY FEATURES

• Detangling & Colour Protection Up to 40 Washes*
• Bottle made from 25% recycled plastic. 100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details
• EXTRA CARE formulas with LIQUID KERATIN, ADVANCED HAIR
TECHNOLOGY & NATURAL ACTIVES help repair existing
damage and provide protection with visibly improved hair
quality.

Warnings

Protect from cold and direct sunlight. Store in an upright position.

FLAMMABLE WARNING

No

Ingredients

Aqua (Water, Eau) · Cyclomethicone · Phenyl Trimethicone · Magnesium Citrate · Dimethylsilanol Hyaluronate · Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract · Hydrolyzed Keratin · Glycerin · Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil · Steardimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Keratin · Sodium Chloride · Citric Acid · Lactic Acid · Dimethiconol · Cetrimonium Chloride · Phenoxyethanol · Potassium Sorbate · Sorbic Acid · Polyquaternium-16 · Sodium Benzoate · Linalool · Hexyl Cinnamal · Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone · Citronellol · Limonene · Parfum (Fragrance) · Benzyl Salicylate · Geraniol · Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone · Benzyl Alcohol

Directions

Shake well before use. Spray onto hair after shampooing and
conditioning. Do not spray into eyes. USE ON: Dry or towel-dried hair. Leave in. Protect from cold and direct sunlight. Store in an upright position

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Bottle is Kerbside Recyclable. Pump & Cap can be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 2 PEHD or HDPE
